name: squared waffle
notes:
10/6/18 - now available in russian

squared waffle is a twist on the traditional waffle stitch, where it created in rows.

this pattern can be made as big or small as you like, some project ideas include:

washcloth, hotpad, cushion cover, blanket

this pattern has been tested 

pictures added to help you along the way

please note the file has both us and uk terms listed, but written in us terminology

**stitches: us/uk terms** 
chain
dc/tr
front post double crochet/front post treble
slip stitch


**english video**
